name: Love Story Eau de Parfum
about: Fragrance Family:.Scent Type:.Key Notes:.About:.What else you need to know:
ingredients: Alcohol Denat., Fragrance, Water, Ethylhexyl Methoxycinnamate, Butylphenyl Methylpropional, Benzyl Salicylate, Benzophenone-3, Ethylhexyl Salicylate, Hydroxycitronellal, Limonene, Linalool, Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone, Butyl Methoxydibenzoylmethane, Citronellol, Hexyl Cinnamal, Geraniol, Bht, Benzyl Benzoate, Citral, Coumarin, Benzyl Alcohol, Propylene Glycol, Acrylates/Octylacrylamide Copolymer, Hydrolyzed Jojoba Esters, Fd&C Yellow No. 6 (Ci 15985), Fd&C Yellow No. 5 (Ci 19140), Ext. D&C Violet No. 2 (Ci 60730), Fd&C Red No. 4 (Ci 14700).

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this fragrance. Initial spray scared me with a screeching citrus but almost immediately turned to a realistic grapefruit. Just a couple minutes in I got a white floral that had almost a coconutty note to it and quickly changed to a clean jasmine. The dry down on me is jasmine, orange flower with a splash of fresh citrus. I only get a faint touch powder. I would describe overall as a easier to wear version of Chloe edp. This falls somewhere between Chloe and Love Story Sensuelle.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is forever my signature scent. I have gone through 4 bottles of these. Itu2019s mature yet playful. Very sophisticated and lasts a while. Bottle is beautiful and clean too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This fragrance has been my fave for several years now.
